wikipedia_page.main: Jason MacIntyre (20 September 1973 – 15 January 2008) was a Scottish racing cyclist.  He was a triple British and Scottish champion time trial cyclist and broke Graeme Obree's 10-mile (16 km) time trial Scottish record in 2007.  He was killed after a collision with a van on the A82 road.

response: * 20 September – Jason MacIntyre, Scottish racing cyclist (died 2008)
